metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8817 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: QEMU (aka Quick Emulator) built to use 'address_space_translate' to map anaddress to a MemoryRegionSection is vulnerable to an OOB r/w access issue.It could occur while doing pci_dma_read/write calls. Affects QEMU versions>= 1.6.0 and <= 2.3.1. A privileged user inside guest could use this flawto crash the guest instance resulting in DoS.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
